document_data.name: ''Heart of Stone''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Heart of Stone''''' was a variety of [[potion]] formulated by the [[green hag]] known as [[Auntie Ethel]], from within her cavernous lair beneath the [[Gnarled Teahouse]] of the [[Putrid Bog]].
document_data.Description: The fluid of this potion continually separated and amalgamated from itself in a rhythmic fashion. Small flecks of [[malachite]] were found within.
document_data.Powers: Any being that drank this draught became highly resistant to both mundane and [[magic]]al [[poison]]s.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, only one bottle of the ''Heart of Stone'' concoction was known to exist, found in Ethel's [[Ancient Abode]].
